title: Which of the following is used to define a hyperlink in HTML?
Which CSS property is used to change the background color of an element?
Which of the following is the correct way to declare a JavaScript variable?
What does the <title> element define?
answer_1: The main heading of the page
answer_2: The title of the HTML document, shown in the browser tab
answer_3: The description of the web page
answer_4: The meta information for search engines
right_answer: The title of the HTML document, shown in the browser tab

title: How do you make text bold in CSS?

What is the correct HTML element for inserting a line break?
Which of the following properties controls the space between lines of text?
What does the addEventListener() method do in JavaScript?
answer_1: Adds an event handler directly to an element
answer_2: Removes an event from an element
answer_3: Adds an event listener to an element without overwriting existing events
answer_4: Prevents an element from responding to events
right_answer: Adds an event listener to an element without overwriting existing events
